abstract: One of India’s top film producers, Sahara India Pariwar, is interested in Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, a deal would probably provoke only relief in Tinseltown because it would not upset the industry’s status quo, Reuters Breakingviews says.
snippet: One of India’s top film producers, Sahara India Pariwar, is interested in Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, a deal would probably provoke only relief in Tinseltown because it would not upset the industry’s status quo, Reuters Breakingviews says.

headline.main: Indian Bid for MGM Is a Safe Move for Hollywood

abstract: The chief deal maker for Google, David Lawee, defends the company’s acquisition strategy in an interview with Reuters.
snippet: The chief deal maker for Google, David Lawee, defends the company’s acquisition strategy in an interview with Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Google‘s acquisition strategy has at times been questioned, whether it was the splashy $1.65 billion deal for YouTube in 2006 or the current approach of making small, roll-up acquisitions, a number of them in social media.
